message: The code in this blog post assumes that DataReceived will be passed the bytes read from the stream, not a partially-filled read buffer. It accepts zero-length packets to allow the other side to detect half-open connections ([http://nitoprograms.blogspot.com/2009/05/detection-of-half-open-dropped.html](http://nitoprograms.blogspot.com/2009/05/detection-of-half-open-dropped.html)).
